title: We Love Tamara
overview: How would you like to see one of the most elegant and beloved celebrities of our country in their daily lives? Welcome to We Love Tamara the personality of Tamara Falcó show. Who is Tamara Falcó? What do we really know about Tamara? What are your plans? For 10 programs will answer these questions and more. Let's discover the other side of Tamara Falcó, a human, funny and spontaneous side that will leave everyone speechless. Tamara Falcó, daughter of Isabel Preysler and Carlos Falcó, Marquis of Griñón, is an icon of elegance and good taste. Accustomed to grab the best covers and lend his image to the most prestigious brands, It is also one of the most acclaimed celebrities for their naturalness and freshness. This personality show you will see from September exclusively on Cosmopolitan TV, it will also feature surprise guests including celebrities, friends and family. Tamara live with their daily lives, we will know closer to their environment, will accompany Paris, London, Greece and also to distant and exotic destination.
